[[מִגְרְשֵׁי]] [[שָׁרוֹן]], region E. of Jordan 1Ch 5:16 (‖[[גִּלְעָד]], [[בָּשָׁן]]; LXX ta\ peri/xwra Geriam, LXX A Sarwn); identified by many with [[הַמִּישׁוֹר]] (De 3:10 etc., v. supr.)
